name: top down raglan baby pullover
notes:
if you're looking for a quick last-minute gift, try this adorable knit sweater. working in the round from the top down using soft bernat forever fleece finest, this pattern is seams-free and fast to knit in a plain stocking stitch fabric with 1 x 1 ribbed edges. featuring a 2-color design, you can choose your favorite shades for this fun pattern that makes a great first garment project.

materials
bernat® forever fleece finest™ (9.9 oz/280 g; 888 yds/812 m) 

sizes 6 12 18 24 mos
contrast a leaf green heather (18009) 1 1 1 1 ball
contrast b daisy heather (18008) 1 1 1 1 ball

finished chest
6 mos 21" [53.5 cm]
12 mos 22" [56 cm]
18 mos 24" [61 cm]
24 mos 26" [66 cm]
